   sa cintayitvā manasā kathameṣa gṛhe mama /	sa cintayitvA manasA kaTam eza gRhe mama /
   nāṭyaprayogo hi bhavediti sādara eva san // BhN_37.3 //	nAwya prayogaH hi Bavet iti sAdaraH eva san // Bhz _37.3 //
   kṛtāñjaliḥ prayogārthaṃ proktavāṃstu surān nṛpaḥ /	kRtAQjaliH prayoga arTam proktavAn= tu surAn nRpaH /
   apsarobhiridaṃ sārdhaṃ nāṭyaṃ bhavatu me gṛhe // BhN_37.4 //	apsaroBiH idam sArDam nAwyam Bavatu me gRhe // Bhz _37.4 //
   pratyuktaśca tato devairbṛhaspatipurogamaiḥ /	pratyuktaH ca tatas devEH bRhaspati purogamEH /
   divyāṅganānāṃ naiveha mānuṣaiḥ saha saṅgatiḥ // BhN_37.5 //	divya aFganAnAm na eva iha mAnuzEH saha saFgatiH // Bhz _37.5 //
   hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca vaktavyo bhavān svargādhipo hi yat /	hitam paTyam ca vaktavyaH BavAn svarga aDipaH hi yat /
   ācāryāstatra gacchantu gatvā kurvantu te priyam // BhN_37.6 //	AcAryAH tatra gacCantu gatvA kurvantu te priyam // Bhz _37.6 //
   proktavāṃstu tato māṃ tu nṛpatiḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ /	proktavAn= tu tatas mAm tu nRpatiH sa kRtAQjaliH /
   idamicchāmi bhagavan nāṭyamurvyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam // BhN_37.7 //	idam icCAmi Bagavat nAwyam urvyAm pratizWitam // Bhz _37.7 //
   pūrvamācāryakaṃ caiva bhavatā'bhihitaṃ śrutam /	pUrvam AcAryakam ca eva BavatA aBihitam Srutam /
   vyaktabhāvātvidaṃ labdhaṃ tvatsakāśād dvijottama // BhN_37.8 //	vyakta BAvAtu idam labDam tvad sakASAt dvijottamaH // Bhz _37.8 //
   pitāmahagṛhe 'smākaṃ tadantaḥpure jane /	pitAmaha gRhe asmAkam tad antaHpure jane /
   pitāmahakriyāyukta murvaśyāṃ sampravartitam // BhN_37.9 //	pitAmaha kriyA yukta murvaSyAm sampravartitam // Bhz _37.9 //
   tasyāḥ praṇāśaśokena unmādoparate nṛpe /	tasyAH praNASa Sokena unmAda uparate nRpe /
   vipanne 'ntaḥpurajane punarnāśamupāgatam // BhN_37.10 //	vipanne antaHpura jane punar nASam upAgatam // Bhz _37.10 //
   prakāśametadicchāmo bhūyastat saṃprayojitam /	prakASam etat icCAmaH BUyas tat saMprayojitam /
   tithiyajñakriyāsvetad yathā syān maṅgalaiḥ śubhaiḥ // BhN_37.11 //	tiTi yajQa kriyAsu etat yaTA syAt maFgalEH SuBEH // Bhz _37.11 //
   tasmin mama gṛhe baddhaṃ nānāprakṛtisaṃśrayam /	tasmin mama gRhe badDam nAnA prakRti saMSrayam /
   strīṇāṃ lalitavinyāsairyato naḥ prathayiṣyati // BhN_37.12 //	strINAm lalita vinyAsEH yatas naH praTayizyati // Bhz _37.12 //
   tathā'stviti mayā prokto nahuṣaḥ pārthivastadā /	taTA astu iti mayA proktaH nahuzaH pArTivaH tadA /
   sutāścāhūya samproktā sāmapūrvaṃ suraiḥ saha // BhN_37.13 //	sutAH ca AhUya samproktA sAma pUrvam surEH saha // Bhz _37.13 //
   ayaṃ hi nahuṣo rājā yācate naḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ /	ayam hi nahuzaH rAjA yAcate naH kRtAQjaliH /
   gamyatāṃ sahitairbhūmiṃ prayoktuṃ nāṭyameva ca // BhN_37.14 //	gamyatAm sahitEH BUmim prayoktum nAwyam eva ca // Bhz _37.14 //
   kariṣyamaśca śāpāntamasmin samyak prayojite /	karizyamaH ca SApa antam asmin samyak prayojite /
   brāhmaṇānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca bhaviṣyatha na kutsitāḥ // BhN_37.15 //	brAhmaNAnAm nRpANAm ca BavizyaTa na kutsitAH // Bhz _37.15 //
   tatra gatvā prayujyantāṃ prayogān vasudhātale /	tatra gatvA prayujyantAm prayogAn vasuDA tale /
   na śakyaṃ cānyathā kartuṃ vacanaṃ pārthivasya hi // BhN_37.16 //	na Sakyam ca anyaTA kartum vacanam pArTivasya hi // Bhz _37.16 //
   asmākaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ nahuṣasya mahātmanaḥ /	asmAkam ca eva sarvezAm nahuzasya mahAtmanaH /
   ātmopadeśasiddhaṃ hi nāṭyaṃ proktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // BhN_37.17 //	Atma upadeSa sidDam hi nAwyam proktam svayaMBuvA // Bhz _37.17 //
   śeṣamuttaratantreṇa kohalastu kariṣyati /	Sezam uttaratantreNa kohalaH tu karizyati /
   prayogaḥ kārikāścaiva niruktāni tathaiva ca // BhN_37.18 //	prayogaH kArikAH ca eva niruktAni taTA eva ca // Bhz _37.18 //
   apsarobhiridaṃ sārdhaṃ krīḍanīyakahetukam /	apsaroBiH idam sArDam krIxanIyaka hetukam /
   adhiṣṭhitaṃ mayā svarge svātinā nāradena ca // BhN_37.19 //	aDizWitam mayA svarge svAtinA nAradena ca // Bhz _37.19 //
   tataśca vasudhāṃ gatvā nahuṣasya gṛhe dvijāḥ /	tatas ca vasuDAm gatvA nahuzasya gRhe dvijAH /
   strīṇāṃ prayogaṃ bahudhā baddhavanto yathākramam // BhN_37.20 //	strINAm prayogam bahuDA badDavantaH yaTAkramam // Bhz _37.20 //
   atropabhogataste tu mānuṣīṣu māmātmajāḥ /	atra upaBogataH te tu mAnuzIzu mAm AtmajAH /
   baddhavanto 'dhikasnehaṃ tāsu tad dvijasattamāḥ // BhN_37.21 //	badDavantaH aDika sneham tAsu tat dvijasattamAH // Bhz _37.21 //
   putrānutpādya vadhvā ca prayogaṃ ca yathākramam /	putrAn utpAdya vaDvA ca prayogam ca yaTAkramam /
   brahmaṇā samanujñātāḥ prāptāḥ svargaṃ punaḥ sutāḥ // BhN_37.22 //	brahmaNA samanujQAtAH prAptAH svargam punar sutAH // Bhz _37.22 //
   evamurvītale nāṭyaṃ śiṣyaiḥ samavatāritam /	evam urvI tale nAwyam SizyEH samavatAritam /
   bharatānāṃ ca vaṃśo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca pravartitaḥ // BhN_37.23 //	BaratAnAm ca vaMSaH ayam Bavizyam ca pravartitaH // Bhz _37.23 //
   kohalādibhirevaṃ tu vatsaśāṇḍilyadhūrtitaiḥ /	kohala AdiBiH evam tu vatsa SANxilya DUrtitEH /
   matyadharmakriyāyuktaiḥ kaścitkālamavasthitaiḥ // BhN_37.24 //	mati aDarma kriyA yuktEH kaScid kAlam avasTitEH // Bhz _37.24 //
   etacchātraṃ praṇītaṃ hi nārāṇāṃ buddhivardhanam /	etat SAtram praNItam hi nArANAm budDi varDanam /
   trailokyasya kriyopetaṃ sarvaśāstranidarśanam /	trElokyasya kriyA upetam sarva SAstra nidarSanam /
   maṅgalyaṃ lalitaṃ caiva brahmaṇo vadanodbhavam // BhN_37.25 //	maFgalyam lalitam ca eva brahmaNaH vadana udBavam // Bhz _37.25 //
   ya idaṃ śruṇuyān nityaṃ proktaṃ cedaṃ svayambhuvā /	yaH idam SruNuyAt nityam proktam ca idam svayamBuvA /
   kuryāt prayogaṃ yaścaivamathavā'dhītavān naraḥ // BhN_37.26 //	kuryAt prayogam yaH ca evam aTavA aDItavAn naraH // Bhz _37.26 //
   yā gatirvedaviduṣāṃ yā gatiryajñakāriṇām /	yA gatiH veda viduzAm yA gatiH yajQa kAriNAm /
   yā gatirdānaśīlānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuyāddhi saḥ // BhN_37.27 //	yA gatiH dAna SIlAnAm tAm gatim prApnuyAt hi saH // Bhz _37.27 //
   dānadharmeṣu sarveṣu kīrtyate tu mahat phalam /	dAna Darmezu sarvezu kIrtyate tu mahat Palam /
   prekṣaṇīyapradānaṃ hi sarvadāneṣu śasyate // BhN_37.28 //	prekzaNIya pradAnam hi sarva dAnezu Sasyate // Bhz _37.28 //
   na tathā gandhamālyena devāstuṣyanti pūjitāḥ /	na taTA ganDa mAlyena devAH tuzyanti pUjitAH /
   yathā nāṭyaprayogasthairnityaṃ tuṣyanti maṅgalaiḥ // BhN_37.29 //	yaTA nAwya prayoga sTEH nityam tuzyanti maFgalEH // Bhz _37.29 //
   gāndharvaṃ ceha nāṭyaṃ ca yaḥ samyak paripālayet /	gAnDarvam ca iha nAwyam ca yaH samyak paripAlayet /
   sa īśvaragaṇeśānāṃ labhate sadgatiṃ parām // BhN_37.30 //	saH ISvara gaNa ISAnAm laBate sat gatim parAm // Bhz _37.30 //
   evaṃ nāṭyaprayoge bahuvidhivihitaṃ karmaśāstraṃ praṇītam |	evam nAwya prayoge bahuviDi vihitam karma SAstram praNItam |
   noktaṃ yaccātra lokādanukṛtikaraṇāt |	na uktam yat ca atra lokAt anukRti karaNAt |
   saṃvibhāvyaṃ tu tajjñaiḥ ||	saMviBAvyam tu tajjQEH ||
   kiṃ cānyat samprapūrṇā bhavatu vasumatī naṣṭadurbhikṣarogā /	kim ca anyat samprapUrNA Bavatu vasumatI nazwa durBikza rogAH /
   śāntirgobrāhmaṇānāṃ bhavatu narapatiḥ pātu pṛthvīṃ samagrām // BhN_37.31	SAntiH go brAhmaNAnAm Bavatu narapatiH pAtu pRTvIm samagrAm // Bhz _37.31
   iti bharatīye nāṭyaśāstre guhyatattvakathanādhyāyaḥ saptatriṃśaḥ	iti BaratIye nAwya SAstre guhya tattva kaTana aDyAyaH saptatriMSaH
   nāṭyaśāstram saṃpūrṇam	nAwya SAstram saMpUrNam
